languages.text: "Сдайся сейчас и расскажи все честно и без утайки, губернатор. Тогда я, возможно, уговорю Соломона убить тебя быстро".
languages.translation_comment: БОЛЬШИМИ БУКВАМИ — потому что это условный сигнал ( о котором РТ договорился в FW_Trap. )
БОЛЬШИМИ БУКВАМИ — потому что это условный сигнал ( о котором РТ договорился в FW_Trap. )

languages.text: "Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."
languages.original_text: "Сдайся сейчас и расскажи все честно и без утайки, губернатор. Тогда я, возможно, уговорю Соломона убить тебя быстро".

traits.locale_text: "Surrender now and tell me everything honestly and completely, Governor. Perhaps then I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."
"Surrender now and tell me everything honestly and completely, Governor. Perhaps then I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."
"Surrender now and tell me everything truthfully and from the beginning, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."
"Surrender now and tell me everything truthfully and from the beginning, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."
"Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."
"Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."

languages.text: “马上投降，总督，把所有的事情一五一十地坦白。说不定我会说服索罗蒙，让他干净利落地送你上路。”
languages.original_text: "Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."

traits.locale_text: “马上投降，总督，把所有的事情一五一十地坦白。说不定我会说服索罗蒙，让他干净利落地送你上路。”

languages.text: 「降伏してすべてを白状しろ、総督。いっそ、ソロモーンに君を速やかに殺すよう勧めてやろうか」
languages.original_text: "Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."

traits.locale_text: 「降伏してすべてを白状しろ、総督。いっそ、ソロモーンに君を速やかに殺すよう勧めてやろうか」

languages.text: «Ríndase y confiese, gobernador. Hágalo, y puede que luego convenza a Solomorne para que le conceda una muerte rápida».
languages.original_text: "Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."

traits.locale_text: «Ríndase y confiese, gobernador. Hágalo, y puede que luego convenza a Solomorne para que le conceda una muerte rápida».

languages.text: "Hemen teslim olup her şeyi itiraf et Vali. Belki o zaman Solomorne'u seni çabucak öldürmeye ikna edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."

traits.locale_text: "Hemen teslim olup her şeyi itiraf et Vali. Belki o zaman Solomorne'u seni çabucak öldürmeye ikna edebilirim."

languages.text: « Rendez-vous et passez aux aveux, gouverneur. En échange, je parviendrai peut-être à convaincre Solomorne de vous tuer rapidement. »
languages.original_text: "Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."

traits.locale_text: « Rendez-vous et passez aux aveux, gouverneur. En échange, je parviendrai peut-être à convaincre Solomorne de vous tuer rapidement. »

languages.text: "Ergebt Euch und gesteht alles, Gouverneur. Vielleicht bitte ich Solomorne dann, Euch schnell zu töten."
languages.original_text: "Surrender now and confess everything, Governor. Perhaps, then, I will convince Solomorne to kill you swiftly."

traits.locale_text: "Ergebt Euch und gesteht alles, Gouverneur. Vielleicht bitte ich Solomorne dann, Euch schnell zu töten."
